thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Beijing Gehua Catv Network To Invest In Media Industry Buyout Fund With Partners

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beijing Gehua Catv Network To Invest In Media Industry Buyout Fund With Partners

organizations.name: gehua catv network to invest in media industry buyout fund with partners feb
reuters) - beijing gehua catv network co ltd

text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Beijing Gehua Catv Network Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT PLANS TO INVEST 500 MILLION YUAN ($79.42 million) TO SET UP MEDIA INDUSTRY BUYOUT FUND WORTH 10 BILLION YUAN WITH PARTNERS Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2EgaAz7 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2955 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
